DOC.brief_summary: This study is aimed to evaluate the effect of renal denervation to decreasing blood pressure and left ventricle remodeling progression in patients after acute coronary syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Renal Denervation in Patients After Acute Coronary Syndrome
DOC.criteria: acute Q negative myocardium infarction (during first 14 days) non stable angina significant stenosis BP > 140/90 torr. during more than 1 year absence of arterial hypertension Thrombolysis during previous 24 hours indications for CABG
